title: All new Ibis Exie is a super light & capable XC mountain bike that’s Made in the USA
content:
Ibis claims that when they started their Carbon 831 Lab, they didn’t initially set out with the goal of in-house manufacturing. Initially, they simply wanted to use it as a tool for prototyping and development, but along the way, they got curious. What is possible when it comes to making carbon frames in the USA? What […]

The post All new Ibis Exie is a super light & capable XC mountain bike that’s Made in the USA appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
